# Minimum Viable Proxy

## Gas Benchmarks:

| Huff Proxy | Open Zeppelin Proxy | function     |
| ---------- | ------------------- | ------------ |
| 1617       | 1752                | name         |
| 1615       | 1750                | symbol       |
| 587        | 728                 | decimals     |
| 736        | 877                 | totalSupply  |
| 953        | 1091                | balanceOf    |
| 1225       | 1360                | allowance    |
| 3527       | 3659                | transfer     |
| 6266       | 6398                | transferFrom |
| 3053       | 3185                | approve      |
